data: TM Fibrinogen Replacement Transfusion (Cryoprecipitate / Fibrinogen Concentrate) (Module)
Medications
sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) bolus
50 mL, IV, as directed, PRN other (see comment), order duration: 1 doses or times, drug form: bag
Blood Products
Order product as per site procedure. Consultation with Pathologist is available. Contact TM
Cryoprecipitate
Cryoprecipitate is not available at all sites
Order in adult doses. Standard adult dose is 10 pooled units
Blood Product Fact Sheet
Administer - Cryoprecipitate Transfusion
Urgent, Administer: 1 Dose, IV, Administer each over: 30 - 60 Minutes, T;N
Fibrinogen
Fibrinogen Concentrate is not available at all sites
Standard dose of fibrinogen is 4 g
Blood Product Fact Sheet
Administer - Fibrinogen Transfusion
Urgent, Administer: 4 g, IV, once, T;N
Urgent, Administer: 1 g, IV, once, T;N
Urgent, Administer: 2 g, IV, once, T;N
Urgent, Administer: 3 g, IV, once, T;N
Urgent, Administer: 6 g, IV, once, T;N
Urgent, Administer: 8 g, IV, once, T;N
